entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 8:56 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:56 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
